identity.mission: Create a receipt tracking app that feels like a high-end financial tool mixed with a botanical journal. Trustworthy but organic.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Finance x Botany
Content is King: Data is beautiful
Zoom In: Focus on receipt details

primary.description: Deep Forest Green - Used for primary actions, active states, and branding.

secondary.description: Pale Sage - Used for secondary buttons and backgrounds.

accent.description: Acid Lime - The 'E1 Twist'. Used for the Scan/Upload FAB and high-priority highlights.

destructive.description: Terracotta - Used for errors, delete actions, and negative values.

headings.usage: All page titles, section headers, and major metrics.

body.usage: General text, table data, form labels.

mono.usage: Receipt numbers, transaction IDs, raw data.

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 where p-4 is standard.

login_hero.alt: Minimalist office desk with silver MacBook
login_hero.usage: Login page side panel or background

texture_overlay.usage: Subtle background overlay for the dashboard to give it a 'physical' feel

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for active states.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium
buttons.fab: fixed bottom-8 right-8 h-16 w-16 rounded-full bg-accent text-accent-foreground shadow-floating hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-200 flex items-center justify-center z-50

cards.dashboard: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-card rounded-2xl p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300
cards.receipt: bg-white border border-border shadow-sm rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-200 group relative

inputs.default: bg-background border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 transition-all duration-200

navigation.sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 bg-card border-r border-border h-screen p-6 fixed left-0 top-0 z-40
navigation.mobile_nav: md:hidden fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-20 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-border flex justify-around items-center z-50 px-4 pb-2

dashboard_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 p-6 md:p-8

areas.summary: col-span-1 md:col-span-4 grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4

receipt_gallery.classes: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6 p-6

login.layout: Split screen. Left: 40% Image (Login Hero). Right: 60% Form.
elements: Quote: 'Financial clarity for the creative mind' (italic, muted).

dashboard.layout: Sidebar (desktop) / Bottom Nav (mobile) + Main Content Area.
dashboard.header: Welcome back, [Name]. Date in mono font.

upload_modal.content: Drag & Drop zone with dashed border (Terracotta color on hover). Camera option for mobile.

anti_ai_rules: Do NOT use generic blue gradients.
Do NOT use 'Inter' font for headings.
Do NOT center text by default.
Use noise/grain texture on the background to kill digital flatness.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is readable on the off-white background.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all inputs.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend. Use the provided colors and fonts. Implement the 'Organic Ledger' theme. Use Shadcn components but override their styles with the classes defined in 'components'. Focus on the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Use the provided image URLs for the login page and user avatar.
